hDesciption: Gamebot is a bot coded by Laizo, it contains several playable games on Discord
hCommands:
```.help : allows to have the list of commands 
.*game* : allows to play a game of this *game* 
.*game* help : allows to have information about this *game*```
hCommandsAdmin:
```.help : allows to have the list of commands 
.*game* : allows to play a game of this *game* 
.*game* help : allows to have information about this *game* 
.pban *joueur* : prevents a player to play a game```
gEmbedReact: To join the game just add the reaction âœ… under this message and a new channel will appear
gEmbedGame: You do  not know the game ?
gEmbedHelp: Make the command `.themind aide` to have all the information
alreadyPlay: You are already in a game
rClassartParty: letters are sent by the bot, the first one who manages to put them back in order wins the round. You have to wins 5 rounds whose difficulty is exponential to win.
Banned: You can not create a game because you have been banned on this server.
bAnnounce: you can not play on this server anymore !
bNoPlayer: You did not mention a player.
